title: Bricklayer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Construct a wall around someone’s house, roleblocking all their visitors. Gain 1 Profit if you construct a wall around a non-evil player, as they pay you for materials.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- RB control immune
Item: Two Bricks
- Cost 1
- Uses 2
- Throw Brick: Throw a brick through chosen player’s house, reducing their defense to vulnerable tonight.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all good players (to appease shareholders)

desc:
Post 5090
*You either join a union or The Guild!*
